body.name: Wireless Lavalier Microphone Compatible with iPhone/iPad/Android Phone/Laptop, IUMAKEVP Plug-Play Lapel Clip-On Mic with Noise Reduction for Video Recording/Live Steam/Interview/TikTok/YouTube(2 Mics)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 52 mins
features: 😄 【PLUG AND PLAY, FULL COMPATIBILITY】 No Bluetooth or app required. The upgraded wireless clip-on microphone is equipped with LIGHTNING and USB TYPE-C and USB-A connection ports. Just select the adapter that suits your device, plug the receiver into the device, and turn on the portable microphone to pair automatically. Compatible with iPhone, iPad, Android Phones, Laptop, MacBook, GoPro, Camera etc.

😄 【Dual Wireless Microphones】 IUMAKEVP lavalier microphone can record two sound sources simultaneously, which is very suitable for recording video of 2-people creating and interviewing. If you are a team of individuals, you will always have a mic at work and one as a backup! It can also charge your phone during record video; no more low battery panic!

😄 【OMNIDIRECTIONAL MIC WITH NOISE REDUCTION】 IUMAKEVP microphones have built-in intelligent noise reduction chip, 360° all-round accurate sound pickup, strong anti-interference ability, effective filtering of noise, even in noisy environments can record clear sound, to meet your pursuit of high sound quality.

😄 【8H WORKING TIME AND 100FT WIRELESS TRANSMISSION】 Wireless microphone transmitter has built-in rechargeable battery and low-power chip, working time up to 8 hours. The 100 feet barrier-free effective distance and 0.005s ultra-low transmission delay allows you to get rid of the shackles of wire to complete sports shooting, mobile phone recording and short video production in a variety of large scenes. Perfect for YouTube/Tik Tok live streaming, video recording, interviews, online meetings etc.

😄 【3 MODES AND REAL-TIME MONITORING】 IUMAKEVP microphone has 3 modes of noise reduction, mute, and reverb. The reverb function enhances the stereo sound and the mute function provides temporary mute in case of emergency. Equipped with Type-C port wired earphone for real-time monitoring, reducing post-editing time.
😄 【2 YEAR WARRANTY】 1) 90-Day 100% Refund Guarantee. 2) 2 Years Free Replacement or Warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will solve it for you within 24 hours.

😄 【PACKING LIST】 The package includes 2 × Microphones, 1 × Receiver, 1 × Type-C to Lightning Adapter, 1 × Type-C to USB-A Adapter, 2 × Type-C Monitor Earphones, 1 × Portable Store Bag, 2 × Extra Anti-spray Sponge, 2 × Extra Clip, 2 × Type-C Charging Cable, 1 × User Manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the simplicity of this setup and the quality of the audio is pretty good except it distorts easily. I wish there was a way to turn down the input volume on an iPhone. Otherwise it’s a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excelente calidad de sonido. Ya lo he utilizado para reuniones virtuales.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these & whether we are on a phone call through Wi-Fi or he is gaming with his friends, I can hear him so much more clearly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better in some ways, but not all
reviews.reviewText: This is better than my laptop/phone mic for meetings/calls, but not for videos, especially singing or other performances. There is a lot of distortion when recording loud sound like singing or musical instruments. But for casual talking it's much better than the laptop and phone microphones.Wireless is great, but I really wish it was Bluetooth. The adapter is a weird shape that blocks other USB ports on my laptop. It would be better if it were straight. It does come with two adapters that convert USBC to lightning and USBA, which is nice, but it's a lot to carry around. A better design would be to have a USBC plug on one end and lightning or USBA on the other end, to reduce or eliminate the need for additional adapters. Even better would be to use Bluetooth so that no adapter is needed at all. The range is still only about 30 ft even with their transceiver, so there's really no benefit over Bluetooth from any perspective.Also there is sometimes a lag in audio which can cause video and audio to become out of sync. It's not huge, maybe a quarter second, but it is absolutely visible and noticeable.Lastly, the case is awful. I almost would prefer no case at all. They give you a little pouch which is very hard to open with one hand, and not quite big enough to fit everything in it. They need to use a hard case like so many other similar products.Overall, I probably won't return it, but I can't recommend it either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good idea but didn't connect to phones
reviews.reviewText: While it is obvious other buyers have had great success with the item, after returning the first mic and getting a second, neither would connect to either of my Android phones. One is a Motorola. Not sure what the problem is. I checked phone settings and every thing I could think of. On one phone both the receiver and mic LED would glow green, but nothing on the second phone. I had to return for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The item and specs as showned in the website is the same and superb

reviews.reviewTitle: C'est un bon microphone pour le prix.
reviews.reviewText: Qualité sonore décente, autonomie acceptable de trois à quatre heures en utilisation continue.Si vous en avez deux, ce n'est pas un problème si vous les utilisez alternativement pour de longues sessions d'enregistrement.Je les recommande vivement selon le cas de chacun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Despite the low price, the quality is surprisingly good. Easy to connect with a variety of devices, including computer and mobile device.
Funziona bene, semplice da usare migliora l'audio delle riprese video fatte con il telefono, usato con Android.

reviews.reviewTitle: Everything i got with a back up
reviews.reviewText: This is product is really good and value for money, haven’t used it , but seems its gonna be really good for what i paid, also i got $7 discount when i bought it, but its worth buying, got 2 of every attachments
